In deep sleep, Tucson continues to battle and resist the power of the tendr=
ills that threaten to over take his power.  He sighs heavilly, as his chest=
 rises and falls with each breath.  The light in his chest continues to pul=
sate, and even brighter than before.  Straight Shot, who was perhaps the cl=
ossest to Tucson as well as Rat Trap, could now feel something they had not=
 yet felt before.  Something deep down in their hearts, a power unlike any =
other, yet simple enough where those who had a heart could feel it. They lo=
ok to each other.  Straight Shot puts a hand on his shoulder.

"Are you thi=
nking what I'm thinking?"

Rat Trap nodds.

"I ain't never felt like this b=
efore but I definitely am think'n what you're think'n.  No one should have =
ta fight a battle on their own, and if Wheels is gonna win this, he needs o=
ur support big time.  Notice how his chest glows brighter, when we get clos=
ser ta the glass? That's what he needs, he needs ALL of us ta believe in hi=
m, it's in our hearts, not in our weapons."

He faces everyone.

"Guys, Whe=
els is fightn' a battle of his life in there, and we all know that no great=
 leader should ever have ta believe that he's alone in battle.  He's got wh=
at it takes in his heart ta stay a float, but, he needs somethn' extra ta g=
o the distance completely.  It's like he said, we all got somethn' those cr=
eepoids don't have.  And it's so simple that even organics have it."

Quick=
stride puts a hand over his chest.  He was very concerned for Tucson and Ro=
dimus.  So much so that he had been trying to hold back a tear but one just=
 simply escapes and cascades down his faceplate. 

" You're right Rat Trap,=
 no great warrior fights alone.  We can't let Tucson and Rodimus die, we ju=
st can't."

Straight Shot steps forward.

"And we're not going to either."
=

Night Shift could hear what was going on, and like Tucson he was a fighter=
.  And a fighter with a heart bigger than his own chest cavity.

" No great=
 warrior fights alone.  Tucson, if you can hear us, big guy, we're all behi=
nd ya a hundred percent."

It's at this time, when a simple red light begin=
s to pulsate in Night Shift.  The same thing happens to Straight Shot, Rat =
Trap, and Quickstride.  And spiritually, they pour their hearts and souls i=
nto hoping that Tucson can pull through and succeed.
